Magnetics

Compact & Robust
High Frequency Power Magnetics

Design Criteria, Inc. is an innovation shop with a broad range of experience in designing and manufacturing power transformers and inductors for all types of switching power supplies. We can manufacture to your print or we can assist in your design. DCI offers off-the-shelf power magnetics in a wide range of current handling capabilities and for harsh environments. We also design custom cores for unique applications.
High Frequency Transformers
Planar Transformers
Design Criteria, Inc. provides a line of planar and low profile power transformers for high-frequency DC-DC converters – flexible for many applications. Packaging options include surface mount and thru-hole. For more information on standard or custom products please contact us.
Conventional Wound Transformers
Design Criteria, Inc. provides a line of low profile power transformers for high frequency DC-DC converters and off-line applications using various core geometries. Packaging options include surface mount and thru hole pins and potted. For more information on standard or custom products please contact us.
Current Sense Transformers
Design Criteria, Inc. offers a line of current sense transformers in surface mount and thru-hole. Call us for more details.
High Frequency Inductors
Planar Inductors
Various low profile and planar inductors are available at Design Criteria, Inc. Call us for more details and for any custom application.
Conventional Wound Inductors
Several conventional wound inductors are standard products at Design Criteria, Inc. which meet demanding applications such as EMI Filter or Output Inductor for DC-DC Converters.
High Current Inductors
Design Criteria, Inc. provides a line of planar and low profile power transformers for high-frequency DC-DC converters – flexible for many applications. Packaging options include surface mount and thru-hole. For more information on standard or custom products please contact us.
Common Mode Chokes
Several common mode choke designs are available that meet the requirements for harsh environments. Contact us for additional information.
